title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit for residential solar energy property.
content: Residential Solar Energy Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited tax credit through tax year 2006 for residential solar energy property equal to the sum of: (1) 15 percent of the taxpayer's qualified photovoltaic property expenditures during the taxable year. And (2) 15 percent of the taxpayer's qualified solar water heating property expenditures during the same year.
